row.entry: All Java extensions in a framework configuration are instantiated in a separate class loader. When true, the JAR libraries used in a certain document type will have priority to resolve classes before delegating to the parent class loader. When false, the parent class loader will take precedence.

row.entry: The number of bytes used for validation threads.

Some parts of the application (validation, content completion) that use the Relax NG parser sometimes require a larger Thread stack size to parse complex schemas. The default value should be more than enough.
